alert.note: Alert for Denali (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 10 at 1:50PM AKST until December 12 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM SUNDAY TO 6 PM AKST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches Sunday evening through Monday evening. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph Sunday evening. Visbility may be reduced to 1/2 mile or less at times Sunday evening. * WHERE...Denali. * WHEN...From 6 PM Sunday to 6 PM AKST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highest snow accumulations are expected along and near the Parks Highway. Blowing snow is also possible Sunday evening, especially along the highway due to windy conditions during the start of snowfall Sunday evening. Winds are expected to taper off Sunday late Sunday evening and transition to a snow only event through Monday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
